overview: Four seperate tales of young women experiencing first time sex. Chloe spends the night at a friends for a slumber party. But when she discovers the big brother and his buddy in her friends room she gets a lot more than she bargained for. Some people say little gia is so dumb she would need a map to find her ass. Good thing she get's to study with these nice boys cause they have no problem finding it. Annie gets to visit her new uncle's ranch and spend some time being a cowgirl. ...
title: 18 and Confused
